person.persName: Virgil M. Pendleton (Kentucky, attorney, captain in the Confederate army)

body.p: Iowa attorney and Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Pendleton. Father of Elisha Pendleton and Ida Pendleton. Attorney in Des Moines County, Iowa, in 1860. Enlisted in the 1st Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private on June 1, 1861, and was mustered out on May 13, 1862. Enlisted in the 8th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain on September 10, 1862, and served until his death at Mount Sterling, Kentucky, on March 27, 1863, from wounds received in battle.
